title: Printing schedules as on screen
content: You may need to print the schedule as you see it on the screen, here are the steps to follow:Â In the Schedules menu choose the type of schedules view you want,Select the departments you want to print,Click on Load,Reduce the window,Use the keyboard shortcut CTRL + P OR Command + P (depending on your computer) to open the page print,Print your document, or export it in Pdf format.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
